properties.Description: The set of properties specific to a Custom Location

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

authentication.Description: This is optional input that contains the authentication that should be used to generate the namespace.

clusterExtensionIds.Description: Contains the reference to the add-on that contains charts to deploy CRDs and operators.

displayName.Description: Display name for the Custom Locations location.

hostResourceId.Description: Connected Cluster or AKS Cluster. The Custom Locations RP will perform a checkAccess API for listAdminCredentials permissions.

hostType.Description: Type of host the Custom Locations is referencing (Kubernetes, etc...).

namespace.Description: Kubernetes namespace that will be created on the specified cluster.

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning State for the Custom Location.

type.Description: The type of the Custom Locations authentication

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)
